message: I have a unique opportunity to sell this product to you, and I believe it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at the moment. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $11,500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
